duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide basic IT support for internal staff and customers through support queues (Service Market Place), addressing problems quickly and thoroughly.
Communicate and collaborate with IT staff to troubleshoot and resolve problems in a timely manner.
Shipping and receiving of equipment from Warehouse and update Ticketing System.
Assist with basic testing and reporting of issues within conference room.
Accurately prepare written business correspondence that is coherent, grammatically correct, effective, and professional.
